technical.title: Array Rotation Problem
technical.description: Given an array and a rotation count k, rotate the array to the right by k positions. For example, if array is [1,2,3,4,5] and k=2, result should be [4,5,1,2,3].
technical.output_format: rotated array elements separated by space

answers.python:
def solve():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    k = k % n
    rotated = arr[-k:] + arr[:-k]
    print(' '.join(map(str, rotated)))

if __name__=='__main__':
    solve()

technical.title: String Palindrome Check
technical.description: Given a string, check if it is a palindrome (reads the same forwards and backwards). Ignore case and non-alphanumeric characters. For example, 'A man, a plan, a canal: Panama' is a palindrome.

answers.python:
def solve():
    s = input().strip().lower()
    # Remove non-alphanumeric characters
    clean = ''.join(c for c in s if c.isalnum())
    # Check palindrome
    print('YES' if clean == clean[::-1] else 'NO')

if __name__=='__main__':
    solve()

testcases.input: A man, a plan, a canal: Panama
